title: Harry Kane reveals penalty routines in Tottenham's draw at Liverpool
description: Harry Kane talked Jamie Redknapp through his penalty technique and routines after he missed one and scored one in Tottenham's dramatic 2-2 draw with Liverpool.
content:
With Spurs trailing 1-0 in the 89th minute at Anfield, Kane won a penalty and stepped up to take it, only to be denied by Loris Karius.
It looked like the miss would condemn Spurs to defeat after Mohamed Salah put Liverpool 2-1 ahead with a superb goal in injury-time.
But Spurs won another penalty and Kane again stepped up, this time firing into the corner to score his 100th Premier League goal.
"As I was waiting I was thinking which way should I go and thought about previous penalties and what I have done," Kane told Sky Sports pundit Redknapp. "I have gone to the left quite a few times so thought the keeper would go that way and I put it in the other corner."
Hit play on the video at the top of the page to watch Kane talk through his technique and approach for both penalties
